DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to evaluate whether (1) targeted smoke alarm education, (2) general fire safety education with a smoke alarm component, (3) basic fire safety education, or (4) an unrelated intervention is most effective way to improve smoke alarm maintenance and function.
DOC.brief_title: Research to Improve Smoke Alarm Functioning and Maintenance
DOC.criteria: live within four target neighborhoods in Prince George's County, MD that are at high risk for residential fire and injury. primary decision maker of home is less than 18 years old speak a language other than english or spanish nobody at home after six return visits to the home
